languages.text: "Род Гапрак. Член вашего дома организовал нападение на Вольного Торговца — это практически роспись в измене".

traits.locale_text: "Член вашего дома организовал нападение на Вольного Торговца и был замешан в организации бунтов. Абеляр, огласи приговор".

languages.text: "...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."
languages.original_text: "Род Гапрак. Член вашего дома организовал нападение на Вольного Торговца — это практически роспись в измене".

traits.locale_text: "House Gaprak. One of your family members organised an attack on the Rogue Trader. It is basically treason."
"House Gaprak. One of your family members organised an attack on the Rogue Trader. It is basically treason."
"House Gaprak. One of your family members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader. It is basically a byword for treason."
"House Gaprak. One of your family members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader. It is basically a byword for treason."
"...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."
"...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."

languages.text: 「…ギャプラック家は有罪だ。お前たちの一員に、自由開拓者襲撃を企てた者がいる。その行為はまさに反逆といえよう」
languages.original_text: "...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."

traits.locale_text: 「…ギャプラック家は有罪だ。お前たちの一員に、自由開拓者襲撃を企てた者がいる。その行為はまさに反逆といえよう」

languages.text: “……贾帕克家族有罪。你们家族中有人策划了针对行商浪人的袭击，这是赤裸裸的叛国行为。”
languages.original_text: "...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."

traits.locale_text: “……贾帕克家族有罪。你们家族中有人策划了针对行商浪人的袭击，这是赤裸裸的叛国行为。”

languages.text: « ... la maison Gaprak coupable. L'un des vôtres a orchestré une tentative d'assassinat à l'encontre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Un crime de haute trahison. »
languages.original_text: "...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."

traits.locale_text: « ... la maison Gaprak coupable. L'un des vôtres a orchestré une tentative d'assassinat à l'encontre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Un crime de haute trahison. »

languages.text: «... que la Casa Gaprak es culpable. Uno de sus miembros organizó un ataque contra su Comerciante Independiente, lo que constituye un acto de traición».
languages.original_text: "...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."

traits.locale_text: «... que la Casa Gaprak es culpable. Uno de sus miembros organizó un ataque contra su Comerciante Independiente, lo que constituye un acto de traición».

languages.text: "... Haus Gaprak für schuldig. Ein Mitglied Eures Hauses hat einen Angriff auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} inszeniert ... das gilt gemeinhin als Verrat."
languages.original_text: "...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Gaprak. Eines Eurer Familienmitglieder hat ein Attentat auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} geplant. Das kommt Hochverrat gleich."

languages.text: "Gaprak Hanesi suçlu bulunmuştur. Hanenizin bir mensubu Hür Tacir'e saldırı düzenlemeye kalkıştı. Bu düpedüz hainliktir."
languages.original_text: "...House Gaprak guilty. One of your members orchestrated an attack on the Rogue Trader — treason by anyone's reckoning."

traits.locale_text: "...Gaprak Hanesi suçlu bulunmuştur. Hanenizin bir mensubu Hür Tacir'e saldırı düzenlemeye kalkıştı. Düpedüz hainliktir bu."
